speak;Emma; Lily! What're you up to?
speak;Lily; Oh, hey Emma. I'm just looking over our food and medical supplies.{w} Your mother and I are supposed to be making dinner tonight,{w} and I'm making sure nothing's poisoned.
speak;Emma; How do you know if food is poisoned?{w} Like, with your magic?
expression;Lily;Smile
speak;Lily; You don't know all my tricks, Emma.{w} Simply put, I just hold the object and sense impurities using light magic.{w} If I find any poison, I can cleanse it.
speak;Emma; All my time training with you, and you never told me about this?
expression;Lily;NoSmile

speak;Lily; I just wanted to show you the basics of healing, not the advanced stuff.{w} The advanced healing spells are very hard to pull off,{w} especially when you don't have enough mana.{w} But, maybe one day, you'll be as strong as me.{w} Then, you'll be ready to learn.
speak;Emma; Hmph, I feel like I'm strong enough to learn now.
speak;Lily; Trust me, you're not.
speak;Emma; Well, you know all I've wanted for a long time is to become a better magic user,{w} so I feel like I'd be better off learning everything I can, right?
speak;Lily; Like I said, when the time is right, I'll show you.{w} Today is just, in fact, not that day.
speak;Emma; Hmph.
speak;Emma; Fine, I'll let you finish looking over the food.{w} Just don't eat everything.
speak;Lily; Don't lump me in with the likes of Marica or Sonia when they get hungry on watch.
speak;Emma; I'll make sure to tell them you said that.
remove_portrait;Emma
speak;Lily; Oh, Emma...

speak;Lily; I can sense there's something special about you. I just don't know what it is...{w} I can see it now, the realization of your strong potential for the mana of light...{w} One day soon.;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
